ygData.subject: RE: Bard Instuments Wishlist
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Depends where you re fighting.  One of the reasons I timed SoW and Selo s is because the perceived speedup is much larger than the actual speedup.  If
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 26 Jul 1999, James Schuldes wrote:
>
> Bind IN the bank! I do when I can - that way spare drum,
> food and wep are all ready to go!

Depends where you're fighting. One of the reasons I timed SoW
and Selo's is because the perceived speedup is much larger
than the actual speedup. If you're fighting in Oasis or South
Ro, it's probably faster to bind in East Freeport and make the
run with just the song, than bind in the bank and run with a
drum but have to zone twice.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
